thread.title: Police: Car plows into Mardi Gras parade crowd in New Orleans; 12 hurt - Sun Sentinel
thread.title_full: Police: Car plows into Mardi Gras parade crowd in New Orleans; 12 hurt - Sun Sentinel

author: Associated Press
title: Police: Car plows into Mardi Gras parade crowd in New Orleans; 12 hurt - Sun Sentinel
text:
Police: Car plows into Mardi Gras parade crowd in New Orleans; 12 hurt Associated Press 
Police say 12 people were injured when a vehicle plowed into a crowd watching the Krewe of Endymion parade in the Mid-City section of New Orleans. 
The Times-Picayune reports the crash was reported Saturday at about 6:45 p.m. 
New Orleans Police Department spokeswoman Ambria Washington says that "initial reports show so far that about a dozen people are in critical condition." 
She says that number could increase as the investigation continues.
